= Introduction =

Thebridge is a EchoLink/IRLP compatable conference bridge (reflector) that runs under various versions of Unix as well as Windows.  theBridge includes a scripting capability that that allows users to extend its operation by interfacing with user written scripts.  The EchoIRLP project uses this capability to use thebridge as a prototocol converter between the IRLP and EchoLink protocols.
